/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars, buses, and trucks, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. Buildings of different sizes and shapes flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, providing a natural contrast to the man-made structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image.
